synopsis.native: Après avoir disparu du jour au lendemain, César réapparaît dans la vie de Salomé et découvre qu’il est le père d’une petite fille de 3 ans. Cette fois-ci, il va tout faire pour être à la hauteur de leur histoire.
synopsis.english: César is a notorious liar, a failing artist and an outsider. He rambles aimlessly through the streets of Montmartre in Paris, where he performs his music. One day, he stumbles across Salome, that he left without a word a while ago, and discovers he is the father of a three-year-old little girl. This time, he will do everything to live up to their story and not mess it up. But his old demons easily resurface.
